Assign

Source: R/general.R
assigned.Rd

Assigns a single value to an entire column.

Usage

assigned(.self, variable, value)

Arguments

.self

data.frame Input data set

variable

character Name of variable to create or modify

value

Value to assign to the variable

Value

.self with added or modified variable

Mighty

Type

derivation

Depends

  • nothing.not

Outputs

  • {variable}

Examples

pharmaverseadam::adsl |>
  dplyr::select(USUBJID) |>
  assigned(variable = "STUDYID", value = "STUDY001")
#> # A tibble: 306 × 2
#>    USUBJID     STUDYID 
#>    <chr>       <chr>   
#>  1 01-701-1015 STUDY001
#>  2 01-701-1023 STUDY001
#>  3 01-701-1028 STUDY001
#>  4 01-701-1033 STUDY001
#>  5 01-701-1034 STUDY001
#>  6 01-701-1047 STUDY001
#>  7 01-701-1057 STUDY001
#>  8 01-701-1097 STUDY001
#>  9 01-701-1111 STUDY001
#> 10 01-701-1115 STUDY001
#> # ℹ 296 more rows
